text: RuPaul's Drag U (as in "Drag University") is an American reality television series. It debuted July 19, 2010, on Logo TV. Its final episode aired in August 2012. It was hosted by RuPaul and a team of drag queen "professors". Drag U was a spin-off of RuPaul's Drag Race. RuPaul confirmed on May 8, 2013 via Twitter that the series had been cancelled. ==Cast== Contestants from RuPaul's Drag Race appear on RuPaul's Drag U as professors.
